name: tm10
effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Double-Edge)

flavor_text.sun_moon: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on the next turn.
